code: import{createAsyncThunk,createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var setDistance=createAsyncThunk('compassInfo/setDistance',function(info){var e=info.e,mouseInfo=info.mouseInfo;var distanceTo=Math.floor(Math.sqrt(Math.pow(mouseInfo.x-e.x,2)+Math.pow(mouseInfo.y-e.y,2)));return distanceTo;});var initialState={distance:0,loading:false};export var compassInfoSlice=createSlice({name:'compassInfo',initialState:initialState,extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addCase(setDistance.pending,function(state){state.loading=true;});builder.addCase(setDistance.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.distance=action.payload;});builder.addCase(setDistance.rejected,function(state){state.loading=false;});}});export default compassInfoSlice.reducer;
